subject: Accept my apologies for this u
body:
Accept my apologies for this unexpected e-mail but my issue requires
urgent attention and I need your participation. I am a legal counsel
to very wealthy Oil Merchant from USA named (Joseph Jones) who died
some years ago in UNITED STATES. This gentleman died leaving a fix
deposit of $10.500,000,00 (ten million five hundred United States
Dollars) with a major Bank which I will disclose to you as you
indicate your readiness to work with me.
I have a very water-tight and sound plan to present you as his
next-of-kin to claim his account balance based on the fact that you
are a foreigner which position you easily as his rightful relation.
 As
the account balance is released to you, we shall therefore split the
funds between ourselves. Kindly get back to me through my secured and
private email (
nestorroma40@gmail.com
); if you are interested within
the next 72 hours.
I will intimate you with more details soon and steps to follow as I
receive your swift reply. Please do include your direct phone number
in your response; I will call you to discuss the modalities with you.
Sincerely,
Capt Nestor Romanus.

subject: Re: Accept my apologies for this u
body:
Hello Capt Nestor Romanus,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your proposal sounds quite intriguing. I'm definitely interested in learning more about this opportunity. Could you please provide me with some additional details? Specifically, I would like to know which bank the funds are held in and what steps we need to take to claim the account balance.

Also, it would be helpful if you could explain how we can ensure that everything is done legally and without any complications. I want to make sure that we follow all the necessary procedures.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Gail

subject: Re: Accept my apologies for this u
body:
Greetings Mr  Gail.



The best of the week to you and your family.

 Trust is all I need from you and if you cannot trust me then I cannot
trust you either if this funds comes to your position so therefore give me
the benefit of doubt lets have this transaction projects done and completed
and have the funds release to us for our splits.

this is an abandoned funds transaction of my colleague who past on years
ago in NIGERIA and all that is needed from you as my partner is for you to
contact the bank manager that is going to help us actualize this
transaction to be successful and create an online account with his bank to
enable him present you as the next of kin to receive the funds he deposited
in his UBA bank by the late {Joseph Jones}


Name...    MR OLAWALE JAMES.
Bank...      UBA BANK
Country...  NIGERIA
Email....    ubabank340@yahoo.com


Kindly keep me posted as soon as you contact the bank manager on that
information for the creation of the account with that bank also i will need
your personal whatsapp number for easier communications with you.

wait to hear from you soonest.


regard


Capt Nestor Romanus.

subject: Re: Accept my apologies for this u
body:
Hello Capt Nestor Romanus,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're doing well. I appreciate your trust and understand the importance of completing projects successfully. However, before we proceed, I would like to gather some more information about this opportunity.

Could you please provide me with more details about the abandoned funds? How much money is involved and what is the reason behind it being abandoned? Additionally, what role do you see me playing in this project?

Regarding contacting the bank manager, could you share their contact information with me? I would like to have a direct line of communication with them to ensure everything is handled properly.

As for my personal WhatsApp number, I prefer not to share that at the moment. Let's continue our conversation through email for now.

I look forward to hearing back from you soon with the requested information.

Best wishes,
Gail

subject: Re: Accept my apologies for this u
body:
Greetings Mr Gail.

The best of the week to you and your family.

Regarding the details about the abandoned funds, He is my colleague and he
died {7} years ago before our retirement in our PILOT training CAMP also he
hard no son or a daughter to claim this funds and upon my discussion with
his bank manager he stated to me they best option to claim this funds is to
look for someone that leave outside the offshore of NIGERIA that can be
presented as the next of KIN to the late deceased which is  {JOSEPH JONES}
to shift the funds.

Our share of these funds is %40 %40 percent between me and you while the
bank manager is going to have %20 percent because he is going to be the one
to facilitate and create the account on your behalf and make the change of
ownership in your favor as the next of kin to the late {JOSEPH JONES}

The money involved is $10.500,000,00 {Ten million five hundred united
states dollars only}

Your only trust and responsibility on this transaction is to create an
account with the bank where the funds are deposited, while I will provide
all the requested document claims of the funds and death certificate of the
late {JOSEPH JONES} which will be presented to the bank after you have
proof your authenticity to create the account with bank manager i directed
you too.

Finally you can write the bank manager on that information I gave to you
for the account creation and request for his contact information yourself
to speak with him,  i.e if you are interested or ready to work with me on
this transaction.

I hope I am understood and thanks for the anticipated understanding.


wait to hear from you soonest as soon as you contact the UBA bank for the
account creation.


regard


Capt Nestor.

subject: Re: Accept my apologies for this u
body:
Hello Capt Nestor,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing this information. I hope you're doing well. I'm sorry to hear about your colleague's passing.

I must admit, this situation sounds quite intriguing. However, I have a few questions before we proceed. Firstly, could you please provide me with more details about the process of creating the account with the bank? How long does it usually take? And what documents would be required from my end?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the bank manager who will be assisting us in this matter. Could you share his name and contact information so that I can reach out to him directly?

I appreciate your patience in answering these questions. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Gail

subject: Re: Accept my apologies for this u
body:
Hello Capt Nestor,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing this information. I hope you're doing well. I'm sorry to hear about your colleague's passing.

I must admit, this situation sounds quite intriguing. However, I have a few questions before we proceed. Firstly, could you please provide me with more details about the bank where the funds are currently deposited? I would like to know more about their reputation and credibility.

Additionally, what documents would be required from me in order to prove my connection to the late Joseph Jones? I want to make sure that everything is done legally and ethically.

Lastly, how long do you think this process will take? I'm curious to know when we can expect the funds to be transferred.

Thank you for your understanding, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Gail

subject: Re: Accept my apologies for this u
body:
I already gave you the UBA bank manager information for you to write him
and request for it contact phone yourself, there is something we called
privacy and I guess you understood what I meant  and it will b advisable
you contact the bank and request it by yourself.

Meanwhile, the late Joseph Jones is my colleague when we were still working
with the NIGERIA airline but he died 8 years ago also without a son or a
daughter to claim the account balance of the funds he has with the UBA bank.

I only need a partner that will stand as the next of KIN and that is why
the bank manager advice me to look for someone because i cannot stand as
the next of KIN for security purposes

I have the proof of his death certificate but that will be disclosed later
when you have contacted the bank to create the account with UBA bank as his
next of kin.

Finally there is nothing to know about UBA bank, UBA is a name of a bank
just like as other bank in your country and nothing more.

Keep me posted as soon as you contact the bank for the account creation.



regard


Capt Nestor Romanus.

subject: Re: Accept my apologies for this u
body:
Hello Capt Nestor Romanus,

Thank you for providing me with the contact information for the UBA bank manager. I understand the importance of privacy, and I will definitely reach out to the bank myself to request their contact phone number.

I'm sorry to hear about the passing of your colleague, Joseph Jones. It must be difficult to handle his financial matters without any immediate family members. I appreciate you considering me as a potential partner to stand as the next of kin for security purposes.

Could you please provide me with more details about how this process works? What documents or information would I need to provide to the bank in order to create the account as Joseph Jones' next of kin? Also, what is the estimated amount of funds that are currently in his account?

Additionally, could you explain a bit more about UBA bank? Is it a well-known and reputable bank in Nigeria? Are there any specific benefits or advantages of having an account with UBA?

I will make sure to keep you updated once I have contacted the bank regarding the account creation.

Best wishes,
Gail

subject: Re: Accept my apologies for this u
body:
Greetings Mr Gail..

The reason you need to have an account with the UBA bank is to enable the
bank manager to make the change of ownership in your favor as the next of
kin to the late deceased.,

Whatever document that will be requested or be mentioned to you by the bank
manager will be provided by me,  you don't have to worry about that as it
is my responsibility to make it available for you to submit to the bank.

Regarding the account creation, that is your responsibility to handle to
proof your trust and commitment on this transaction,  as soon as you
contact the UBA bank manager on that information I gave to you, the bank
manager will direct you on what to do regarding the account creation,  not
me because I don't work with the UBA bank.

Your Last Question, the mean reason you need to have an account with the
UBA bank is because an atm card will be ship to your home address which you
will use in making withdrawals as well as the online access for you to have
access to the funds once the abandoned funds is released in your UBA bank
account.

I hope all your questions are answered, perhaps keep me posted with the UBA
bank manager's response as soon as you contact him for the account creation
to enable us proceed with our transaction.


wait to hear from you soonest.


regard


Capt Nestor

subject: Re: Accept my apologies for this u

Gail
